resources.string: Submit access point information to the public database of Mozilla Location Service
Used for the leaderboard of Mozilla Location Service (when submitting)
Mozilla Stumbler is a tool to contribute information to the public database of Mozilla Location Service
Whether to send Wi-Fi data to the geolocation service
Whether to send Cell data to the geolocation service.\nThis requires Android 4.2 or later.

Mozilla Location Service is a free, user-powered location database.
Ichnaea Backend allows you to contribute to the database and thus increase location accuracy for all users without additional battery or network usage.
Touch here to open settings and enable contribution. Thanks.
